    • copy

      public static long copy(InputStream in, OutputStream out, byte[] buffer, ObjIntConsumer<byte[]> onBeforeWrite) throws IOException
      Copies bytes from an InputStream to an OutputStream.

      This method uses the provided buffer, so there is no need to use a BufferedInputStream.

      Parameters:
      in - the InputStream to read.
      out - the OutputStream to write.
      buffer - the buffer to use for the copy
      onBeforeWrite - a callback that is called before each write operation
      Returns:
      the number of bytes copied.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • copyAndClose

      public static long copyAndClose(InputStream is, OutputStream os) throws IOException
      Returns:
      number of bytes copied
      Throws:
      IOException

    • readBytes

      public static byte[] readBytes(InputStream is) throws IOException
      Throws:
      IOException

    • readBytes

      public static void readBytes(InputStream is, byte[] b, int off, int len) throws IOException
      Reads len bytes of data from the input stream into an array of bytes. This method blocks until the given number of bytes could be read.
      Parameters:
      b - the buffer into which the data is read.
      off - the start offset in array b at which the data is written.
      len - the exact number of bytes to read.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • readBytes

      public static byte[] readBytes(InputStream is, int len) throws IOException
      Reads len bytes of data from the input stream into an array of bytes. This method blocks until the given number of bytes could be read.
      Parameters:
      len - the exact number of bytes to read.
      Throws:
      IOException

      Parameters:
